languages.text: На лбу сервитора печать добровольца — он сам выбрал лоботомию, причем в юном возрасте.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Бывший Служка ставший сервитором обречен вечно служить Императору

languages.text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.
languages.original_text: На лбу сервитора печать добровольца — он сам выбрал лоботомию, причем в юном возрасте.

traits.locale_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.
The servitor is monotonously removing specks of dust from every inch of the reliquary.
There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

languages.text: El servidor tiene una marca de voluntario en la frente. Este hombre escogió la lobotomía por decisión propia, y a una edad temprana, además.
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

traits.locale_text: El servidor limpia continuamente todo rastro de polvo de cada milímetro del relicario.

languages.text: サーヴィターの額には志願者の印がついている。この男は自ら好んで、しかもかなり若いうちにロボトミー手術を選んだのだ。
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターは、聖遺物箱の隅々から埃を取り除く作業を繰り返している。

languages.text: 这台机仆的额头上烙着志愿者的印记。这个男人还很年轻的时候，就自愿接受了脑叶切除手术。
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

traits.locale_text: 机仆重复着单调的动作，清理着圣骨匣内每个角落的灰尘。

languages.text: Auf der Stirn des Servitors prangt das Mal eines Freiwilligen Dieser Mann hat sich bereits in jungen Jahren für eine Lobotomie entschieden.
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

traits.locale_text: Der Servitor entfernt eintönig Staubpartikel von jedem Zentimeter des Reliquiars.

languages.text: Le front du servitor porte la marque d'un volontaire. Cet homme a choisi de subir une lobotomie, et cela, à un très jeune âge.
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.

traits.locale_text: Le servitor dépoussière méthodiquement chaque centimètre carré du reliquaire.

languages.text: Hizmetörün alnında bir gönüllü işareti yer alıyor. Bu adam, kendi iradesiyle ve oldukça genç bir yaşta lobotomiyi seçmiş.
languages.original_text: There is a volunteer's mark on the servitor's forehead. This man chose lobotomy willingly and at quite a young age.
